['DescriptionPositioned in the prestigious Meydan One project, Azizi Riviera is set within a multiphase development of 71 buildings spread across four phases comprising 13 regions, a mega integrated retail district, luxury four- and five-star hotels and lush greenery.
The new Azizi Riviera is all about community living, evoking the classic Mediterranean Riviera lifestyle with a modern, contemporary outlook. Long walks on paved paths, beautiful sunsets and just a short distance from water transport, yachting facilities and a proposed marina, you will always feel safe and warm.
Azizi Riviera combines the best of French Mediterranean design perspective and modern architecture to create the ideal place for modern community living. Azizi Riviera comprises of 69 mid-rise residential buildings, a mega integrated retail district, breathtaking waterfront views and lush greenery.
Azizi Riviera invites its residents to feel at home and be a part of a diverse and multicultural community. Family-friendly outdoor activities, leisure, dining and retail therapy are a slice of everyday life. In more ways than one, Azizi Riviera is creating a new paradigm for community living in Dubai.

Further, The Address Residence Fountain Views is set in a great location overlooking many man made wonders; the tallest building in the world; Burj Khalifa & Dubai Fountain.
Call Narayan Nihalani (11185) on +971558834941 for further details.']

Dubai is known for being a city of many successes. Boulevard Point at Downtown Dubai now sets the bar for location, luxury and investment potential. Nestled within a popular, well-established community, Boulevard Point boasts unparalleled views of The Old Town, and Downtown Dubai.
Boulevard Point in Downtown Dubai with its exclusive location residing between the Dubai Fountains alongside Mohammad bin Rashid Boulevard, provides world-class facilities including swimming pools, a fully-equipped gymnasium and direct walking access to the world's largest shopping center, Dubai Mall.
Boulevard Point is elegantly outfitted to both reflect and complement the cosmopolitan lifestyles of its inhabitants. Stone counter-tops, pendant lights and glass paneling enhance each living space with a tasteful, modern aesthetic."]
